description: A solution of extracted essence chemicals with a specific property, and saline solution to dilute and preserve it.  This is a stimulant.
//: Note, all compounds aren't exclusively what their broad category is, when combined or processed effects may change.

description: A solution of extracted essence chemicals with a specific property, and saline solution to dilute and preserve it.  This is a painkiller.
A solution of extracted essence chemicals with a specific property, and saline solution to dilute and preserve it.  This is an anesthetic.
A solution of extracted essence chemicals with a specific property, and saline solution to dilute and preserve it.  This is a disinfectant.
A solution of extracted essence chemicals with a specific property, and saline solution to dilute and preserve it.  This is a regenerative.
//: Great example of more than it appears to be, this would contain coagulants for example.

description: A solution of extracted essence chemicals with a specific property, and saline solution to dilute and preserve it.  This is a hallucinogen.
//: Requires chemical activation to cause the hallucinations, otherwise mainly a mood booster.

description: A solution of extracted essence chemicals with a specific property, and saline solution to dilute and preserve it.  This is an antibiotic.
A solution of extracted essence chemicals with a specific property, and saline solution to dilute and preserve it.  This is a sedative.
//: Think of it as both a downer effect like booze, and something like diazepam or a sleeping pill, very broad category.
